value:
$WmMPID_ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Normal,Face|$w0|So this is it... The Tempest. The source
of the chaos that has engulfed our
world.$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|$w0|That's right. If we don't do something
about it...destruction is all we have to
look forward to. $k$pThe Tempest distorts time and
space. Worlds become
entangled...and they begin to mix. $k$p$WmMPID_ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Normal,Face|$w0|The fact that all of us are meeting
like this is proof of that, I'd say. $k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|$w0|In another world, there are more like
us—those who fight against the
Tempest. $k$pThey are our ray of hope. $k$pIf we work together, we can change
the future... I'm sure of it.$k$p$WmMPID_ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Normal,Face|Of course we can! Let's fight to get
our future back!$k$p

$WmMPID_ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Normal,Face|$w0|The Tempest is weakening, it seems.$k$p$WmMPID_リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Normal,Face|$w0|They never even saw us coming!
Now, come on! We've got to tell my
brother all about what we did.$k$p$WmMPID_ノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Hee hee! We're the best!$k$p$WmMPID_サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_Normal,Face|$w0|It's all thanks to the power of my love.
It's twice as potent right now, so I'm
twice as strong as usual. Heh.$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|$w0|Our true gratitude should go to the
warriors from the other world.$k$pThey fought at our side as true
heroes.$k$pUnfortunately, we do not know when
the Tempest will strike again. I must
find a way we can fight back...$k$pI refuse to let any world be consumed
by despair. Not if I have any say.$k$p
